metadata.name: My Ugly Christmas Sweater
metadata.description:
We are giving you an opportunity to create your own Ugly Christmas Sweaters, exactly how you want them to look. As hideous, or as stylish as you desire.  

You can gift them to your #frens to say #gm on a wintery Christmas day. Or collect them yourself to show off to the people that matter and let them know you are an advocate of all Ugly Sweaters at Christmas. 

There will only be 8,888 available mints of these Ugly Christmas Sweaters, so act fast. There is no need for rarity traits here frens, you are the rarity. Each one is like a snowflake, unique in its own rights and exquisite in its construction. 

May this Christmas bring you many reasons to smile, 

Love, Santaâ€™s Elves. xxx
